languages.text: "Старик, хватит мне пенять за каждый разгул офицерья. Иногда на корабле происходят побоища и анархия без моего участия".
"Stop blaming me every time one of the officers flies off the handle, old man. Not every brawl or disaster on the ship is because of me."
languages.original_text: "Старик, хватит мне пенять за каждый разгул офицерья. Иногда на корабле происходят побоища и анархия без моего участия".

traits.locale_text: "Stop blaming me every time one of the officers flies off the handle, old man. Not every brawl or disaster on the ship is because of me."
"Stop blaming me every time one of the officers flies off the handle, old man. Not every brawl or disaster on the ship is because of me."
"Stop blaming me every time one of the officers flies off the handle, old man. Not every brawl or disaster on the ship is because of me."
"Stop blaming me every time one of the officers flies off the handle, old man. Not every brawl or disaster on the ship is because of me."

languages.text: “不要每次军官一出现什么问题，就怪到我的头上来，老家伙。又不是所有争吵和灾难都是我引起的。”
languages.original_text: "Stop blaming me every time one of the officers flies off the handle, old man. Not every brawl or disaster on the ship is because of me."

traits.locale_text: “不要每次军官一出现什么问题，就怪到我的头上来，老家伙。又不是所有争吵和灾难都是我引起的。”

languages.text: « Arrêtez donc de m'accuser chaque fois qu'un des officiers pète un câble, vieillard. Je peux pas être responsable de toutes les bagarres ou de tous les désastres qui frappent ce vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: "Stop blaming me every time one of the officers flies off the handle, old man. Not every brawl or disaster on the ship is because of me."

traits.locale_text: « Arrêtez donc de m'accuser chaque fois qu'un des officiers pète un câble, vieillard. Je peux pas être responsable de toutes les bagarres ou de tous les désastres qui frappent ce vaisseau. »

languages.text: "Hört auf, mir jedes Mal die Schuld zu geben, wenn einer der Offiziere ausrastet, alter Mann. Nicht jede Prügelei und Katastrophe auf dem Schiff liegt an mir."
languages.original_text: "Stop blaming me every time one of the officers flies off the handle, old man. Not every brawl or disaster on the ship is because of me."

traits.locale_text: "Hört auf, mir jedes Mal die Schuld zu geben, wenn einer der Offiziere ausrastet, alter Mann. Nicht jede Prügelei und Katastrophe auf dem Schiff liegt an mir."

languages.text: 「士官の一人が暴れるたびに私を責めるのはやめてよ、お爺さん。船上での乱闘や災難がすべて私のせいだと思うなら大間違い」
languages.original_text: "Stop blaming me every time one of the officers flies off the handle, old man. Not every brawl or disaster on the ship is because of me."

traits.locale_text: 「士官の一人が暴れるたびに私を責めるのはやめてよ、お爺さん。船上での乱闘や災難がすべて私のせいだと思うなら大間違い」

languages.text: «Deja ya de echarme la culpa de todos los arrebatos de los oficiales, anciano. No todas las peleas y las calamidades de la nave son culpa mía».
languages.original_text: "Stop blaming me every time one of the officers flies off the handle, old man. Not every brawl or disaster on the ship is because of me."

traits.locale_text: «Deja ya de echarme la culpa de todos los arrebatos de los oficiales, anciano. No todas las peleas y las calamidades de la nave son culpa mía».

languages.original_text: "Stop blaming me every time one of the officers flies off the handle, old man. Not every brawl or disaster on the ship is because of me."

languages.text: "Subayın teki balatayı her sıyırdığında benden bilme ihtiyar. Gemideki her arbedeyi her faciayı ben çıkarmıyorum."
languages.original_text: "Stop blaming me every time one of the officers flies off the handle, old man. Not every brawl or disaster on the ship is because of me."

traits.locale_text: "Subayın teki balatayı her sıyırdığında benden bilme ihtiyar. Gemideki her arbedeyi her faciayı ben çıkarmıyorum."
